title: Omawari-San, Mata Ashita
alternative_title: お巡りさん、また明日; Mr. Police Officer; See You Tomorrow
status: お巡りさん、また明日; Mr. Police Officer; See You Tomorrow
description:
Description :
        [Translated by Mosh Scans]Takeda Haruto, a friendly, popular, and reliable police officer. While on duty, he gets involved in an accident but is saved by an even bulkier man than him who luckily happens to be there to carry Haruto princess style! Even if he approaches his savior, Sakura, who he admires as a young but strong man in charge of guarding a VIP, Sakura puts a cold distance between themIt seems he bears a trauma connected to the police.However, Sakura slowly opens his heart to Haruto soon after, who closes the distance between them through his bright nature.What happens next is a series of major heart-pounding incidents that'll fan the gap that's overflowing with his masculinity and forcefulness that he only keeps to himself.The springtime that once ceased of two pure sweet and sour adults has begun.+
